track.name: Crimes
comments: someone please explain this kind of "beat" to me
@mambo4dude thats what i was getting from it too lol
sounds like the backing to a movie where its the first time you see the bad guys, walking in slow motion with a bunch of henchmen surronding, cool stuff
Best lack of music I've heard in awhile...
I usually skip this track on the CD...
Oh, and is it a coincidence that it reminds me a tiny bit of Queen's "We will rock you", just paced differently?
Maynard's such a genius, he can just count and you still can get a lot of sense from it. Hypnotic song, it somehow makes me shiver.

one of their BEST albums. they have a really good version of when the levee breaks, and a great track named sleeping beauty, and so much more on their albums.  also their version of some tool songs are excellent.
I swear this album helps me get through the day at work :/
Bah I LOVE APC SO MUCH!!!!!
